A random idea:

  1. allow attaching an arbitrary string to tensors - some sort of name or tag
  2. impl with AllocateWithTag('fft') construct
  3. allow enumerating diagnostics for tensors by tag - size, device, type etc

This would allow investigating such issues by mere mortals :) as long as all tensors get through PyTorch memory management

A random idea:
1) allow attaching an arbitrary string to tensors - some sort of name or tag
2) impl `with AllocateWithTag('fft')` construct
3) allow enumerating diagnostics for tensors by tag - size, device, type etc

This would allow investigating such issues by mere mortals :) as long as all tensors get through PyTorch memory management
